text: The Wind Cannot Read is a 1958 British World War II romantic drama movie directed by Ralph Thomas and was based on the 1946 novel by Richard Mason. It stars Dirk Bogarde, Yoko Tani, Ronald Lewis, John Fraser, Anthony Bushell, Marne Maitland, Donald Pleasence and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1958 war movies Category:1958 romantic drama movies Category:British war movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Ralph Thomas Category:World War II movies
title: The Wind Cannot Read
